installCommand: curl -L -o flutter.tar.xz https://storage.googleapis.com/flutter_infra_release/releases/stable/linux/flutter_linux_3.24.3-stable.tar.xz && tar xf flutter.tar.xz && mv flutter /vercel/flutter && export PATH="/vercel/flutter/bin:$PATH" && flutter precache && flutter doctor --android-licenses < /dev/null && flutter doctor && flutter pub get
